section: Each Member will be responsible for its respective duties as follows: Page 3 of 13 Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD To be paid within 90 days of signing this agreement. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The description of duties for BorrowMoney.com, inc lacks clarity and precision. The phrase '*HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements*' is vague. It's unclear what specific 'technical aspect requirements' entail. This ambiguity makes it difficult to determine the scope of BorrowMoney.com, inc's responsibilities and could lead to disputes over whether they have fulfilled their obligations. Also it is inconsistent that BorrowMoney.com, inc duties are listed while JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go duties are listed as money. There is no description of what these duties are

section: Each Member will be responsible for its respective duties as follows: Page 3 of 13 Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD To be paid within 90 days of signing this agreement. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The phrase 'Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions' is vague and makes it difficult to determine when payments are due and what determines an 'Awarded Contract'. It is not clear what is considered an 'Awarded contract' and if this is based on a specific amount that must be won or any revenue earned.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD in cash. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The 'Agreed Value' for JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go is listed as $3,500,000.00 USD, which is inconsistent with the stated contribution of '$60,000.00 USD in cash. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions'. This creates a contradiction within the agreement as the stated cash contribution does not equal the 'Agreed Value'.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD in cash. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The description of the capital contribution for BorrowMoney.com, Inc. includes '1,500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty*'. This phrase is unclear and mixes a physical contribution (office space) with a vague reference to duties, making it difficult to assign a concrete value or understand the precise nature of the contribution. The inclusion of '*specified Description of duty*' further obfuscates the meaning and creates ambiguity about what duties are being referenced. It is also vague what 'leased/rent' means and who will be paying the lease or rent. The lease can be an asset if owned, or a liability if paying for it and its terms are not clear.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined based on the total revenue generated over the last 3 months. An appraiser will be appointed within a reasonable period of the date of withdrawal or dissolution. The results of the appraisal will be binding on all Members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be based on the proportion of their respective capital account less any outstanding liabilities a Member may have to the Venture. The intent of this section is to ensure the survival of the Venture despite the withdrawal of any individual Member.
explanation: The methodology for valuing the Venture in the absence of a written agreement is based on the 'total revenue generated over the last 3 months.' This valuation method is incomplete because it doesn't account for the ventures expenses. This would cause an inaccurate valuation of the company which could cause a breach of contract.
